text: was a Japanese swimmer. He competed in the men's 1500 metre freestyle event at the 1928 Summer Olympics and the water polo tournament at the 1932 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1909 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Japanese male swimmers Category:Japanese male water polo players Category:Olympic swimmers of Japan Category:Olympic water polo players of Japan Category:Swimmers at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Water polo players at the 1932 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Takaji Takebayashi
